mapper.select: SELECT of.attached_file_name attached_file_name, of.attached_file_directory attached_file_directory, sf.attached_file_name source_attached_file_name, sf.attached_file_directory source_attached_file_directory FROM ( SELECT COALESCE(fd.attached_file_name,'없음') attached_file_name, COALESCE(fd.attached_file_directory,'없음') attached_file_directory FROM attached_file af, file_detail fd WHERE af.original_no=#{original_no} and af.attached_file_no = fd.attached_file_no ) of , ( SELECT COALESCE(fd.attached_file_name,'없음') attached_file_name, COALESCE(fd.attached_file_directory,'없음') attached_file_directory FROM attached_file af, file_detail fd WHERE af.original_no=#{source_no} and af.attached_file_no = fd.attached_file_no ) sf
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO logic ( original_no, project_no, summary, contents, category, generating_date, source_no, user_id ) VALUES ( #{original_no}, #{project_no}, #{summary}, #{contents}, #{category}, now(), #{source_no}, (select user_id from user_info where id = #{id}) )

INSERT INTO file_detail ( attached_file_no, attached_file_directory, attached_file_name, attached_file_type, attached_file_date ) VALUES
( #{item.ATTACHED_FILE_NO}, #{item.ATTACHED_FILE_DIRECTORY}, #{item.ATTACHED_FILE_NAME}, #{item.ATTACHED_FILE_TYPE}, now() )
